title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the average life expectancy is low.

Two points for describing a section of the pyramid that indicates average life expectancy is low.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe the average life expectancy indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown using one of the following:
The response correctly describes the average life expectancy indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown using one of the following :
The response correctly describes the average life expectancy indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown using one of the following :

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that there is limited health care or lack of contraceptive use.

Two points for explaining that there is limited access to health care and family planning programs due to limited government funding.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following health care factors that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph:
The response correctly explains one of the following health care factors that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph:
The response correctly explains one of the following health care factors that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that there are likely many out-migrants from this location.

Two points for explaining why there are likely many out-migrants from this location due to economic and employment conditions.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which out-migration from this community may affect the population structure shown in the graph:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which out-migration from this community may affect the population structure shown in the graph:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which out-migration from this community may affect the population structure shown in the graph:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that there will be a need for more services or physical infrastructure.

Two points for explaining that there will be increased needs for public service institutions and transportation infrastructure due to the rapidly growing population.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following possible outcomes regarding future infrastructure needs based on the population pyramid shown:
The response correctly explains one of the following possible outcomes regarding future infrastructure needs based on the population pyramid shown:
The response correctly explains one of the following possible outcomes regarding future infrastructure needs based on the population pyramid shown:
